name: domains
description: Modal Confirm with 3 API calls 12 state bindings

text.value:
You need to create an "A" record with **152.70.203.204** in your DNS records from your domain provider.

Below are the links for various providers:

**[Go Daddy ↗️](https://www.godaddy.com/en-in/help/add-an-a-record-19238){target="_blank"}**
**[Namecheap ↗️](https://www.namecheap.com/support/knowledgebase/article.aspx/319/2237/how-can-i-set-up-an-a-address-record-for-my-domain/){target="_blank"}**
**[bluehost ↗️](https://www.bluehost.com/help/article/dns-management-add-edit-or-delete-dns-entries){target="_blank"}** > Domains Tab
**[Domain.com ↗️](https://www.domain.com/help/article/dns-management-how-to-update-a-records){target="_blank"}**
**[Hostinger ↗️](https://support.hostinger.com/en/articles/4468886-how-to-manage-a-records){target="_blank"}**
**[HostGator ↗️](https://www.hostgator.com/help/article/how-to-change-dns-zones-mx-cname-and-a-records#add-dns){target="_blank"}**

supportingText.value: Add the url pattern ex: http://sitezump.ai or https://sitezump.ai or www.sitezump.ai
